locations: Harlem, New York City, New York, USA::(location)
imdb.plot outline: Pixie Dust is an urban fantasy about a powerful 16-year-old girl named Faye and her mentally ill mother. Faye's mother suffers from a mental disorder, which sends her into violent spells. Faye's mom refuses to take her medication, forcing Faye to do whatever she can to get her mom back on track. Through Faye's journey, she discovers a magical family secret that enables her to force her mother to take her medication - saving her mother and herself, but at what cost?
imdb.title: Pixie Dust
plot: _Pixie Dust_ (qv) is an urban fantasy about a powerful 16-year-old girl named Faye and her mentally ill mother. Faye's mother suffers from a mental disorder, which sends her into violent spells. Faye's mom refuses to take her medication, forcing Faye to do whatever she can to get her mom back on track. Through Faye's journey, she discovers a magical family secret that enables her to force her mother to take her medication - saving her mother and herself, but at what cost?::Damon Colquhoun
